title: Bug 8142 - No Scoped Type Hierarchy on Binary Projects
description: When I hit F4 on a binary project selection, the scoped type hierarchy is not displayed. This behavior is not expected.
OB: The scoped type hierarchy is not displayed when hitting F4 on a binary project selection.
EB: The scoped type hierarchy should be displayed when hitting F4 on a binary project selection.
SR:
Steps to reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a binary project in the IDE. 
2. Select a file within the project. 
3. Press F4 to open the Type Hierarchy. 
4. Verify that the scoped type hierarchy is not displayed.
